column7: sc. funeral service will be 1:00 p. m. saturday
column8: june 13 at bethany a. r. p. church with the rev. alan morrow officiating. interment will be in woodside cemetery. the family will receive friends 11:30 1:00 at the church. mrs. mathis was born november 5
column10: sc to the late joseph ernest and mary davis thomas. she was the widow of preston lamar mathis. survivors are her sisters beth thomas dalzell of clover
